item.title: Digi increases LTE coverage in the Klang Valley, Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Digi. In this image, Digi’s CEO, Albern Murty (left), demonstrates the high quality and reliability of their 4G LTE network through a video call. The call connects with Hitz.FM radio personalities Ean and Adam C, visible on the smaller screen to the left. Loh Keh Jiat, Digi’s Chief Sales Officer, stands on the right. Digi Telecommunications has significantly broadened its LTE network coverage in the Klang Valley, more than doubling its reach in this region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-increases-lte-coverage-in-the-klang-valley-malaysia/

item.title: Digi has teamed up with Telenor to provide its subscribers with a complimentary image storage service
item.description:
Telenor, through Digi, has launched Capture, a free mobile app and cloud storage service for backing up images and videos. Capture allows users to automatically save and back up photos and videos from their devices, safeguarding memories if their phone is lost or needs to be replaced. It also provides additional storage, especially useful for entry-level devices with limited capacity. Non-Digi customers can download and utilize Capture with 2GB of free storage space...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-has-teamed-up-with-telenor-to-provide-its-subscribers-with-a-complimentary-image-storage-service/

item.title: The Chinese New Year promotion by Digi highlights the importance of family and tradition
item.description:
Source: Digi website. For many Chinese individuals, the Chinese New Year signifies the only opportunity to reconnect with distant family members. Malaysian telecommunications company Digi is capitalizing on this tradition with a new promotional campaign designed for a global audience. Recognizing that in today’s world, many individuals simply use titles like ‘aunt,’ ‘uncle,’ and ‘cousin’ for relatives beyond their immediate family, Digi’s campaign encourages the use of more precise family titles within Chinese families...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-chinese-new-year-promotion-by-digi-highlights-the-importance-of-family-and-tradition/

item.title: Digi introduces 4G LTE service in Johor Bahru, Malaysia
item.description:
Source: Digi. Pictured at the launch of Digi’s 4G LTE service in Johor Bahru are (from left): Tuan Haji Rizal B. Abd Malek, Regional Head of the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (SKMM) Southern Region; Loh Keh Jiat, Digi’s Chief Sales Officer; YB Datuk Ir Haji Hasni B Haji Mohammad, Chairman of the Johor Executive Council for Public Works, Rural and Regional Development; Digi’s Chief Network Officer Kesavan Sivabalan; and Ng Chak Khin, Digi’s Head of Southern Region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-introduces-4g-lte-service-in-johor-bahru-malaysia/

item.title: The Pi1M Training Programme offered by Digi provides benefits to small business owners
item.description:
Source: Digi. Participants of the Pi1M Training Programme gathered for a group photo. Digi Telecommunications recently conducted a training program for community members residing near the company-managed Pusat Internet 1 Malaysia (Pi1M) centers. This tailored program reflects Digi’s commitment to fostering online entrepreneurship within its Pi1M communities. Currently, Digi manages 34 Pi1Ms across Pahang, Kelantan, Terengganu, Johor, Melaka, and Sarawak, with plans to establish 70 more centers by year’s end...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-pi1m-training-programme-offered-by-digi-provides-benefits-to-small-business-owners/

item.title: Digi is sponsoring customers to participate in the Earth Hour 2015 Night Walk
item.description:
Source: Digi Telecommunications. Digi Telecommunications is sponsoring 200 customers to join the WWF-Malaysia Earth Hour 2015 Night Walk in Penang and Sunway Pyramid. This event coincides with the Earth Hour 2015 celebration on March 28, 2015. As the Night Walk@Sunway’s corporate sponsor, Digi has donated RM35,000 to support WWF-Malaysia’s environmental conservation efforts. Digi is sponsoring 200 walk packs, costing RM60 each, for its customers. 100 packs are designated for Night Walk@Sunway and 100 for Night Walk@Penang...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/digi-is-sponsoring-customers-to-participate-in-the-earth-hour-2015-night-walk/

item.title: In May 2015, Digi prepaid customers have the chance to win smartphones, tablets, and cars
item.description:
Source: Digi. Thrane. Digi Telecommunication (Digi) is celebrating its 20th anniversary by giving back to its prepaid customers. Throughout May, Digi will be offering prizes like smartphones, tablets, and even cars. From May 1st to May 31st, customers who top-up their prepaid credit are eligible to win prizes. Every day, 20 smartphones will be given away, with 200 tablets awarded weekly. Two lucky winners will even drive home a Ford Ranger...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-may-2015-digi-prepaid-customers-have-the-chance-to-win-smartphones-tablets-and-cars/
